{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=XAVB5001 |asin=B004DVEW8I |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |est_release_date=01/2011 |type=Powerline Adapter |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7400 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606EM1I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8021 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=AFE/Line Driver IC;Atheros;AR1500;;1;,,, Energy-Efficient Off-Line Switcher w/Extended Power Range;Power Integrations;TNY276PN;;1;,,, Optical Photocoupler;Toshiba;TLP781;;2; |flags=HomePlug AV |oui_eth=E0:91:F5, A0:21:B7 }} The individual adapter's model is XAV5001. XAVB5001 is the kit.
{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/home/products/powerline-and-coax/high-performance/xavb5001.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=xavb5001}}
[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31420-netgear-xavb5001-powerline-av-500-adapter-kit-reviewed SmallNetBuilder Review] :"2976354004" is silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atheros]] AR7400 ARM11 *Storage: 2MB NOR Flash *Memory: 32MB (DDR) SDRAM *Network: 1x 1GbE port *Power Source: 100-240V AC
